title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama. Supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface). Runs in Docker or standalone.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama. Fluent builder API for chat, generate, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop client (Electron) that supports Ollama, OpenAI, and other providers.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin for VS Code that uses Ollama models locally.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats via Ollama and supports slash commands & model switching.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community n8n node to integrate Ollama models into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio support and strongly-typed requests/responses.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama targeting JVM, Android, and native.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with support for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv extension that automatically downloads and starts Ollama when entering a project directory.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles (Llama 2 Uncensored, CodeLlama 70B Instruct, etc.).

title: r/ollama
summary: Subreddit for Ollama users sharing tips, benchmarks, and integrations.
